UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Novel cationic cryptides in Penaeus vannamei demonstrate antimicrobial and anti-cancer activities.
Literature.Author: Abd El-Aal AAA, Jayakumar FA, Lahiri C, Tan KO, Reginald K

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:<10% Cell death=25 µM,Human erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:20% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 11774(MIC=0.78µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 11774(MBC=0.78µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-41(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-41(MBC=12.5µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=1.56µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(MIC=25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(MBC=>50µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ATCC 17802(no activity data),Candida albicans TIMM 1768(MIC=25µM),Candida albicans TIMM 1768(MFC=25µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma Caco-2(IC50=26.8±0.4µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT 116(no activity data),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=11.1±0.7µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=16.8±0.6µM),Human neuroblastoma SH-SY5Y(no activity data),Human rhabdomyosarcoma(IC50=19.2±0.9µM)
